document.full_text: alel bol fled with four of her six children when armed northerners on motorbikes roared into her home in sudan's contested abyei border region and, she said, bombs started falling from the sky.
document.title: south sudan says 80,000 flee after north takes abyei
lines_and_colors: alel bol fled with four of her six children when armed northerners on motorbikes roared into her home in sudan's contested abyei border region and, she said, bombs started falling from the sky.
